item.title: Leaves are causing severe slip hazard; leaves were swept into huge piles a week ago but due to rain and wind have now all spread over the path. Its treacherous and needs sorting ASAP, 12th November
item.description:
From Lansdown Road end of Queens Road all the way to Monpellier
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 12th November
item.description:
FixMyStreet ref: 8397501.: Willow Tree 10 meters from property. Honeybourne Drive Cheltenham GL510QJ Tree situated on public footpath has been re-pollard over the years and is due maintenance. During highlands branches have been found on footpath and garden and the growth is very near the roof
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green or amber traffic light is not working problem, 12th November
item.description:
Permanent Lights out in all four directions.
Report on FixMyStreet
